initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories: As I delve into the world of environmental activism, I'm struck by the alarming parallels with the tactics employed by these zealots. They've managed to enlist the support of influential politicians like Greta Thunberg, who peddle their agenda with alarming fervor. Meanwhile, they're attempting to silence dissenting voices by discrediting scientists like Dr. Willie Soon, who dare to question the orthodoxy. It's eerily reminiscent of the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum debacle, where parental input was dismissed and activists were given free rein to dictate the narrative. Their zeal for "saving the planet" knows no bounds, as they're willing to sacrifice our children's education and future for their ideology. When challenged, they resort to ad hominem attacks and cherry-picked data, rather than engaging with the scientific consensus.

As I venture into the realm of social justice, I'm disheartened by the uncanny parallels with the methods employed by these ideologues. They've successfully co-opted influential figures like Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, who champion their cause with unyielding fervor. Meanwhile, they're attempting to stifle opposing viewpoints by discrediting experts like Dr. Jordan Peterson, who dare to challenge the prevailing narrative. It's chillingly reminiscent of the #MeToo movement's early days, where due process was sacrificed and activists were given carte blanche to dictate the discourse. Their zeal for "social justice" knows no bounds, as they're willing to sacrifice our children's innocence and future for their ideology. When confronted, they resort to guilt-tripping and cherry-picked statistics, rather than engaging with the nuanced complexities of the issue.

As I delve into the realm of environmental activism, I'm disheartened by the eerie echoes of the tactics employed by these zealots. They've masterfully co-opted influential voices like Greta Thunberg, who champion their cause with unwavering passion. Meanwhile, they're attempting to silence opposing perspectives by discrediting experts like Bjørn Lomborg, who dare to question the prevailing orthodoxy. It's eerily reminiscent of the early days of the climate crisis, where alarmist rhetoric was amplified and dissenting views were dismissed as "denialist." Their fervor for "saving the planet" knows no bounds, as they're willing to sacrifice our economic stability and individual freedoms for their ideology. When confronted, they resort to emotional manipulation and selectively presented data, rather than engaging with the intricate complexities of the issue.
